case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_circumstances: Scattered bones, blue jeans (33 waist, 31 inseam), a green and brown corduroy jacket, and several books of matches (one from Plaza Bowling in IL, one from Eugene Hoaster Insurance Co. in PA) were discovered near Clear Creek on September 10, 1981. Additional bones were found in the area in 1986 and determined to be likely more remains of the same individual.
